content: As an AI language model, I do not have knowledge of current events or recent developments. However, in general, the Speaker of the House in Georgia regularly advocates for various budget proposals and initiatives that align with his or her priorities and those of the House of Representatives. For example, in the past, the Speaker has advocated for increased funding for education, healthcare, and transportation. Additionally, the Speaker has been involved in efforts to reform the state's tax code and budgeting process, as well as ways to support economic growth and development in the state. It's worth noting that budget proposals and initiatives can vary widely from year to year based on the political environment, economic conditions, and other factors that influence state priorities and needs.
